DOC.brief_summary: The study will address the impact of genetical variation of a protein involved in the intestinal absorption of two new anticoagulants : Dabigatran etexilate and Rivaroxaban.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacogenomic Study on PKD/PKC of Dabigatran Etexilate and Rivaroxaban
DOC.detailed_description: The study will address the impact of genetical variation of a protein involved in the intestinal absorption of two new anticoagulants : Dabigatran etexilate and Rivaroxaban.
DOC.criteria: Healthy participants Aged between 1835 years inclusive Male Caucasian Body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 27 kg per mÂ² inclusive.
